programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas at the Catnip Café
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a marketing executive and a veterinarian as they work together to plan a fundraising event to help stray cats find homes during the holidays.

programme.title: The Christmas Baby
programme.desc: Erin and Kelly agree to temporarily care for a baby who mysteriously shows up on their doorstep days before Christmas. However, as the couple spend more and more time with the boy, they start to realize they want to adopt him for themselves.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Sara prefers to be on the sidelines at work until someone steals her big idea for a Christmas initiative. She makes a wish to Santa to gain the courage to stand up for herself, and he gives her 48 hours to discover how to speak her own mind.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: A series of mishaps disturbs the plans of a recently divorced mom (Anne Heche) for her two kids on their first Christmas without dad.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman plans to meet her future in-laws at Christmas and, through a serendipitous series of events, spends the holiday with a warm and caring family whose son catches her eye.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: Christmas Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Eager to avoid Christmas, Ella Neezer, a CEO, books an international trip that skips the holiday, until three spirits journey Ella through her life to rediscover her Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Little Christmas Charm
programme.desc: A jewelry designer teams up with an investigative reporter to find the owner of a charm bracelet before Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Bills Love Story
programme.desc: Sparks fly between two lifelong Buffalo Bills fans as they try to discover the identity of a mysterious Christmastime gift giver.

programme.title: A Royal Montana Christmas
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by her royal duties, Princess Victoria visits Big Sky Country for Christmas and meets her dashing guide at the ranch. She must decide if love is worth leaving her royal life behind.

programme.title: A Grand Ole Opry Christmas
programme.desc: When Gentry returns to the iconic Grand Ole Opry, a magical twist of fate sends her back in time to discover love and hope.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: Three Wisest Men
programme.desc: As life pushes their family in different directions, the Brenner boys decide they need to put on the best Christmas ever to bring everyone back together.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: A Suite Holiday Romance
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a struggling writer and a British tourist as they spend Christmas week in New York City's Grand Fairbanks Hotel.

programme.title: Twelve Dates 'Til Christmas
programme.desc: Kate has difficult decisions to make and turns to Delilah for help; despite Laura's commitment to not meddle, she wants to make things right for Callum and Kate.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Life deals Zoey Hathaway a strange blow when she inherits a reindeer farm and becomes buried in taking care of the animals and all of the Christmas responsibilities.

programme.title: Mingle All the Way
programme.desc: A young entrepreneur is trying to win over investors for the dating app she has developed. To help bring on investors for expansion, she promises to take part in using it in the coming weeks before Christmas to find love and track her progress.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in the Virginia countryside. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the family, although they seem to be a family in name only.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Christmas With Tucker
programme.desc: In the months following his father's death, a boy learns about responsibility, the loyalty of friends and the power of love through his bond with a special dog.

programme.title: Once Upon a Holiday
programme.desc: When a royal princess runs away from her official obligations and duties, she starts to fall in love with a good Samaritan who is unaware of her real identity.

programme.title: Naughty or Nice
programme.desc: Krissy Kringle (Hilarie Burton) receives Santa's naughty or nice book by accident and starts exposing the naughty deeds of people around her.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: A World Record Christmas
programme.desc: An boy with autism is determined to break a Guinness World Record by stacking 1,400 blocks. In the spirit of the holiday, his mother and stepfather organize a fundraiser to give the townspeople an opportunity to decorate and donate a block.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Dr. Sharon Hayes returns home to search for a beloved family heirloom. With the help of an adorable little girl and her dispirited father, together they rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After being told her new holiday app lacked Christmas spirit, a young CEO returns to her hometown to rediscover the meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Reunited at Christmas
programme.desc: As a child, Samantha spent every Christmas at her beloved Nana's house building the traditions of fun and joy with her family. Sam is facing the first Christmas without Nana and still struggling to find the Christmas spirit when she gets a surprise.

programme.title: Christmas Land
programme.desc: After inheriting a Christmas tree farm, a woman's plans to sell it change when she falls in love with the townspeople and meets a charming lawyer named Tucker.

programme.title: Five More Minutes
programme.desc: Inspired by Scotty McCreery's song "Five More Minutes," a woman's Christmas wish is answered in unexpected ways when her late grandfather's journal turns up and reveals an untold romance.

programme.title: Christmas in Montana
programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.title: The Christmas Ornament
programme.desc: Kathy plans to avoid any holiday traditions that bring back memories of her late husband until she receives an ornament from a handsome shop owner. To move on from her loss, Kathy works for a balance between her memories and finding a future.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: Christmas at Dollywood
programme.desc: When a NYC event planner returns to Tennessee to organize the Christmas celebration at Dollywood, she's paired with the head of operations who thinks he can handle the party just fine on his own.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: Christmas Festival of Ice
programme.desc: Emma is determined to keep her hometown's Christmas ice-sculpting contest going. She enlists sponsors and artists, but Nick, the town's ace artisan, isn't interested in competing until he sees what Emma has accomplished.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: A man and a woman from rival families try to mend their respective fathers' decades-old feud. They soon find romance along the way as they compete in a holiday decorating contest.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree

programme.desc: Kao i muškarci, i slovenačke dame će se boriti za trofej kupa u odbojci. Uvek je dobro nastaviti sezonu znajući da već imate jedan pehar.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Asvel - Efes

programme.title: NCAA američki nogomet - New Orleans Bowl: Southern Miss - Western Kentucky

programme.title: Koledž košarka: Virginia - American University
programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati.

programme.title: Fudbal: Turska liga - Pregled
programme.desc: Pogledajte najbolje momente sa utakmica Turske lige, takmičenja osnovanog 1958. godine u kom je najviše titula osvajala ekipa Galatasaraja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Afrički kup nacija: Senegal - Botswana
programme.desc: Afrički kup nacija je popularno fudbalsko takmičenje za najbolje fudbalske reprezentacija afričkog kontinenta. Svake dve godine pred očima celog sveta dobija se novi kralj Afrike.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turski kup: Bolu - Fethiye
programme.desc: Turski kup je fudbalsko takmičenje 156 najboljih profesionalnih i amaterskih turskih ekipa koje svake sezone kreću u lov na laskavu titulu osvajača kupa. (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke

programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Benfica - Famalicao
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.
